class  PositionChecker
 Contains all logic for distance calculation and index selection. More...
 

Detailed Description

PositionChecker module to calculate the lights currently present in the robots FoV.

Subscribes to the robot's ground truth position data and calculates its distance to every light in the simulation. Lights currently in the FoV can be passed to other modules with via callbacks.
